english.segment1: i drove around this town. it looks the same as 1998. when everyday we drove around this town. trying to find our way
english.segment2: how did the lights start setting on my dear. new york, new york. i'll make this loud so maybe you can hear
english.segment3: you know i love love love what you've got. i know know know that i'm not. the greatest father that girl could have. promise me you'll drive around with me soon
english.segment4: i drove around this town like 90. but not much is the same. well i still pray a lot for you. i do it every day
